IT WORKS GREAT! But I had the language problem but after awhile I figured it out! What you can do is go the gears main folder then click options to change to english and if that doesn't work then in that same folder go to the binaries folder and delete the lang text file then everything turns english. It worked for me I hope it works for you all.
